body:
Hi Maria,

You are right. Check this post: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/changed-loc...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/changed-location-of-the-department-of-energy-weather-file)

You probably need to update the link which you can find it on epwmap ([http://mostapharoudsari.github.io/epwmap/](http://mostapharoudsari.github.io/epwmap/))
